scripts.build:ensure: rm -rf .next && (next build && node -e "process.exit(require('fs').existsSync('.next/server/pages-manifest.json')?0:1)" || (echo 'Retrying with --debug...' && next build --debug))
scripts.start: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('.next/server/pages-manifest.json')){console.error('Missing .next/server/pages-manifest.json. Build incomplete.'); process.exit(1);} console.log('Build OK');" && next start -p 3010
